column4: is there a way to get ".." to display in the the file browser?
that is the directory one level up
so you can't see the permissions for the higher directory while you are in the child
can you take a screen shot of what you are seeing
so the back error should take you back  or "up" a level
when i first open the file browswer, the "back arrow" will be grayed out and cant be used
it will pull in all the KDE dependencies which is quite a lot for a file browser
there must be a setting for "show hidden files" or something which will show . and ..
I'd be very dissapointed if that was not the case, there certainly is on my non-ubuntu nautilus browser
yeah, I've just tried that in mine, I agree
go->open parent, a ver ugly solution
go to the "go" menu and then "parent directory"
yup that works.  how can i get that in one button on the front?  not in a sub menu?
